meanings.definition: The act of animating or giving life to something.
meanings.sent1: The interanimations of the puppet show delighted the children.
meanings.sent2: The interanimations of the characters in the movie were so realistic.
meanings.sent3: The interanimations of the cartoon animals made them seem almost real.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling had the interanimations of a master painter bringing a canvas to life.
meanings.sent5: The interanimations of the toy robot amazed the young audience.

meanings.definition: The interaction or communication between animated beings.
meanings.sent1: The interanimations between the characters in the video game were intense.
meanings.sent2: The interanimations among the animals in the forest were fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: The interanimations between the two cartoon characters led to a hilarious misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: The interanimations between the actors on stage created a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The interanimations between the bees in the hive were a dance of cooperation.

meanings.definition: The process of bringing together or combining different elements.
meanings.sent1: The interanimations of colors in the painting created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent2: The interanimations of flavors in the dish made it a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The interanimations of music genres in the concert surprised the audience.
meanings.sent4: The interanimations of ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious cake.
meanings.sent5: The interanimations of styles in the fashion show showcased creativity and innovation.
